s.text: The news was greeted with half-hosannas, since it further establishes the fact that the real power in Northern California is in Silicon Valley, not San Francisco.
The news was greeted with half-hosannas, since it further establishes the fact that the real power in Northern California is in Silicon Valley, not San Francisco.
In the 49 years since Giannini's death, the 94-year-old BofA has discarded much of the old way, but even today the bank supports urbanity high and low.
You can buy sheets, linens, and furniture now in the great granite temple on Grant Avenue that was once the headquarters of Security Pacific National Bank.
There is a loss of face in the move of the bank's home office, as well as a blow to San Francisco's economy.
Its San Francisco branches cash-at-par public benefits checks without requiring recipients to have bank accounts there.
